channel.title: Music – Keren Ann
channel.description: Recent content in Keren Ann on Music

item.title: Keren Ann - Not Going Anywhere
item.description:
작사: Keren Ann Zeídel
KY: 61769 / KY: 21028

This is why
I always wonder
I’m a pond
full of regrets
I always
try to not remember
Rather than forget
this is why
I always whisper
when vagabonds are
Passing by
I tend to keep
Myself away
from their goodbyes
Tide will rise
and fall along the bay
And I’m not
going anywhere
I’m not
going anywhere
People come and go
and walk away
But I’m not
going anywhere
I’m not
going anywhere

This is why
I always whisper
I’m a river
with a spell
I like to hear
but not to listen
I like to say
but not to tell
This is why
I always wonder
There’s nothing new
under the sun
I won’t go
anywhere
So give my love
to everyone
Tide will rise
and fall along the bay
And I’m not
going anywhere
I’m not
going anywhere
People come and go
and walk away
But I’m not
going anywhere
I’m not
going anywhere

Tide will rise
and fall along the bay
And I’m not
going anywhere
I’m not
going anywhere
People come and go
and walk away
And I’m not
going anywhere
I’m not
going anywhere
People come and go
and walk away
But I’m not
going anywhere
I’m not
going anywhere
